RelatedSentence: Some great films have been made about the horrific Iraq War , from The Hurt Locker to Stop - Loss , though not every movie to explore the human face of the conflict has met with success .
Some great films have been made about the horrific Iraq War , from The Hurt Locker to Stop - Loss , though not every movie to explore the human face of the conflict has met with success .
Green Zone and Body of Lies stand as the two most prominent examples of films which failed to add anything to the national discussion of American foreign policy in the war - torn nation .
This week , Benedict Cumberbatch , Will Poulter and Tye Sheridan signed on to star in the film .
Poulter is set to play a 21 - year - old who meets a young recruit ( Sheridan ) in boot camp and , at the prompting of the boy 's mother , agrees to watch his back when they are deployed to Iraq .
